revised_title: Development and Application of Al-Zn-Mg-Cu Alloys for Aircraft
tldr: This article discusses the development and application of Al-Zn-Mg-Cu alloys for aircraft. It highlights the historical development of high-strength alloys and their influence on engineering and functional requirements related to aircraft size, design, and manufacturing methods. The article also covers the challenges faced in the development of these alloys, such as stress-corrosion cracking, and the advancements made in alloy compositions and processing techniques to improve their performance and reliability.
